post.description: Post here with authorization code for authorization code grant type or username and password for password grant type, or refresh token for refresh token type. This corresponds to the token endpoint, section 3.2 of the OAuth 2 RFC

post.description: Will create and return an authorization code, then edirect to GET /oauth/authorize/:code with the authorization code.
